review.title: “Good place to work but could be even better.”
review.pros: Pros – Good benefits - free gym in the company building + recreational area with WII, free lunches (three fully fitted kitchens available and free TESCO deliveries twice a week), free home Internet / landline, free mobile for private use (if reasonable used), free car park etc.
review.cons: Cons – Lack of any training provided. You have to learn 'on the fly'.Management don't listen what other people may think about improvements.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please, please - listen to what people have to say. Don't rely only on the top managers' opinions. Listen what others have to say, too.
